venue.name: Myles Standish State Forest amphitheater (behind the headquarters)

item.description:
You can meet Smokey Bear and a real NASA astronaut. They'll tell you about Smokey's recent trip to space and teach you how to "Train Like an Astronaut" with lots of games, exercises and activities for you to try. When it gets dark, stargaze with the group. Myles Standish is a great place to look at stars!

This is for kids! Everything is free.

Little Smokey Bear has gone where no bear has gone before! On May 15, 2012, Smokey traveled aboard the Soyuz spacecraft with an American astronaut to the International Space Station.

Now that he's back, Smokey is coming to Myles Standish and he wants to meet you and show you how he learned to spot fires from space!

NASA, the U.S. Forest Service and DCR Forest Fire Control are working together to raise awareness about wildfires.  Myles Standish SF is one of the locations across the country selected to host this special program.

You'll meet a real astronaut, Capt. Mike Foreman, who flew on the Space Shuttle on two missions to the International Space Station. Also, we will have a representative from the US Forest Service, the head of Massachusetts Department of Conservation and Recreation and of course Smokey Bear.

Meet at the Amphitheater behind Headquarters.

Bring a lawn chair, bug spray, and a picnic dinner. (Watch that picnic basket!) We'll bring the cookies.

Call park headquarters if rain is forecast. (508-866-2526)

P.S. If you can volunteer to help with this event, please let us know.

The International Space Station will be flying overhead for 2 minutes at 8:27 pm and 10:03 pm.  NNW to NNE both times. (The Soyuz will be visible at 8:54 and 10:31 in the same general area.) More info on sightings available here.)

We also need more telescopes for sharing (and people who know how to use them!)

Read about Smokey Bear's recent trip to space with NASA astronauts aboard a Russian Soyuz rocket.

Smokey Bear along for the ride to space station

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Meet Smokey Bear and a real NASA Astronaut
